TopicTitle: Jool Periapsis keeps Changing on its Own

Articles.Content:
I keep burning and whenever I timewarp, the orbit changes. Not much, but sometimes a few billion meters. Whenever this happens, I can't select Jool as a target or focus on it, except I can with any other celestial body. I can post pictures of my ship and mods for anybody who asks.

By the way, this only happens in orbit of the Sun.

Edited June 27, 2018 by tymur888

What version of KSP are you on? This used to be a thing about a year ago but I haven't had it in 1.3+...

If 1.4.4 might be time for a bug report.
